Boris Mijatović

Get Started

Music composer and sound designer based in Belgrade, Serbia, focused on scoring for picture.

Projects

Letter to his next lover

Author: Aleksandra Pešić
Camera: Veljko Lalović
Editing: Stefan Rokvić
Music and sound design:
Boris Mijatović
Arrangement:
Boris Mijatović & Mateja Dobrodolac

Priručnik za samoubice

Kratki igrani film
Director: Kruna Kablar
Music: Boris Mijatović
Music recording and mixing:
Aleksa Račić
Violin: Margo Ivanović-Režak
Cello: Dunja Gavrilović
Accordion: Igor Filipović
Photo: Neda Mojsilović
Production: Faculty of Drama arts in Belgrade
